::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a very brief introduction to the Julia programming language. It is not meant to teach Julia coding, only to get you started with using Julia.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Know what Julia is.
* Be able to run Julia.
* Have basic understanding of how to run code in Julia.

:::


::: {.course-content}
# Course Content

The course consists of these modules and units.
